name: Chiron
description: a parallel scientific workflow management system with solid provenance data management available for runtime queries

name: d-Chiron
description: A version of Chiron that provides parallel and distributed provenance data management

name: SciCumulus
description: a parallel scientific workflow management system with solid provenance data management available for cluster and cloud environments

name: ARMFUL
description: a component-based architecture for analyzing raw data from multiple files
